document_data.name: Overland Flight
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Overland flight''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that functioned like the spell ''[[fly]]'', except that it only affected the caster and was slightly slower, but lasted much longer.

Over an eight-hour period, the caster of ''overland flight'' could travel up to 64 miles.
document_data.Components: The spell required both [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.Uses: ''Overland flight'' was a necessary component in the crafting of ''[[tapestry of shadowy flight|tapestries of shadowy flight]]'', as well as [[drow]] ''[[driftdisc]]s''.
